00003 APTtool::APTtool() {
00004   valid = false;
00005   r=a=b=h=0.0;
00006   A=B=0.0;

00009 //generate ball nose tool with radius rr
00010 APTtool::APTtool(double rr, double hh) {
00011   r = rr, h = hh;
00012   Handle(Geom_TrimmedCurve) Tc;
00013   Tc = GC_MakeArcOfCircle (gp_Pnt(rr,0,r), gp_Pnt(0,0,0), gp_Pnt(-r,0,r));
00014   TopoDS_Edge Ec = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(Tc);
00015   TopoDS_Edge E1 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(gp_Pnt(r,0,r), gp_Pnt(r,0,h));
00016   TopoDS_Edge E2 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(gp_Pnt(-r,0,r), gp_Pnt(-r,0,h));
00017   TopoDS_Edge E3 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(gp_Pnt(-r,0,h), gp_Pnt(r,0,h));
00018   BRepBuilderAPI_MakeWire wm(Ec,E1,E2,E3);
00019   //assert( wm.IsDone() );
00020   TopoDS_Wire w = wm.Wire();
00021   //assert( w.Closed() );
00022   BRepBuilderAPI_MakeFace f(w);
00023   //assert (f.IsDone());
00024   profile = f.Face();
00025   bool valid = true;
00026   shapeType = BALLNOSE;
00027 }

00029 APTtool::APTtool(double rr,double aa,double bb,
00030                  angleDegrees AA,angleDegrees BB, double hh) {
00031   r = rr, a = aa, b = bb;
00032   A = AA, B = BB, h = hh;
00033   classify();
00034   if (!valid) {
00035     //tool creation failure
00036   } else {
00037     //generate the shape
00038   }

00040 
00041 /*
00042 ** classify()
00043 ** figure out what the tool is, based on the parameters
00044 ** side effect: valid=true if the parameters are ok, otherwise false
00045 ** this is incomplete, really need to come up with a generic formula
00046 ** useful (?) code to find tangency at
00047 **   $CASROOT/../samples/standard/java/src/SampleGeometryPackage/
00048 **   SampleGeometryPackage.cxx:2026 and :2106
00049 */
00050 void APTtool::classify() {
00051   const double small = Precision::Confusion();
00052   valid = false;
00053   if( h < 4.0 * r) return; //too short
00054   if( a+b > r ) return; //makes no sense
00055   if( A >= 90.0 ) return; //ditto
00056   if( A+B > 90.0 ) return; //ditto
00057   if( (A < small) && (B < small) ) { //no angles
00058     if( a < small ) { 
00059       if( abs(b - r/2.0) < small ) {
00060         shapeType = BALLNOSE;
00061         valid = true;
00062       }
00063       return;
00064     } else if( (abs(a-r) < small) && (b < small) ) {
00065       shapeType = CYLINDRICAL;
00066       valid = true;
00067     }
00068   } 
00069 }
